{1}{U}{B}, {T}: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.flavor:
「这就是在食物链底层要付出的代价。 我们必须把这美丽地方好好掩藏，而不能展示给大众。」
～艾维欣僧侣西汀
cards.name: Shimmering Grotto
cards.originalText:
{T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。
{1}，{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: 当年轻纯真的少女流干了血，欢宴就此结束。
cards.name: Stensia Bloodhall
cards.originalText:
{T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。
{3}{B}{R}，{T}：史顿襄血厅对目标牌手造成2点伤害。
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{3}{B}{R}, {T}: Stensia Bloodhall deals 2 damage to target player.

cards.flavor: 史革达教众在瀑布帘幕后方集会，与恶魔势力一同密谋。
cards.name: Sulfur Falls
cards.originalText:
除非你操控海岛或山脉，否则硫磺瀑布须横置进战场。
{T}：加{U}或{R}到你的法术力池中。
cards.text:
Sulfur Falls enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: 农民砍掉树木，埋葬逝者。 逝者起身杀死农民； 树长回来将逝者绞死。
cards.name: Woodland Cemetery
cards.originalText:
除非你操控沼泽或树林，否则林地墓园须横置进战场。
{T}：加{B}或{G}到你的法术力池中。
cards.text:
Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.
